data.actual_result: Everything except for the search textbox and top right icons goes left off the screen forcing you to switch servers to fix it
data.expected_result: The menu shows up as in a normal server
data.short_description: Ctrl-F on a channel with an extremely long name misaligns the interface
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel with a name so long that it goes past the top right icons in length - Press Ctrl-F
